## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description        | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `fraction` | `fraction` | show as percentage | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `max`      | `max`      | The max rating     | `number`  | `100`       |
| `rating`   | `rating`   | The rating         | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`     | The rating         | `string`  | `'md'`      |
